title: I got bms info sci in comedk round 3 should I leave the pessat seat and take bms instead?

comments.body: If you got the pes seat through pessat, id recommend you to leave. It's just the matter of money. The opportunities you get is almost the same

The point is in BMS, they don't have enough classrooms and for some classes it shift based or it's only on afternoons or mornings or something like that, and it is really crowded than pes, make your choice, if you have cs seat then don't leave PES
blud pes has literally 1.1k just for cse and aiml, how is bms more crowded üíÄ
But there are atleast enough classes to sit in , rather than the varies class timings and shift based system
By the way I meant ec campus
If you combine both the campus (during placements and all) it's the largest crowd and too much competition..I've seen Seniors talk about it..Campus doesn't matter man.
Im guessing aiml + aids + cs + is also adds to 1.1k~
